# `WorkitemScoredAgentRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | An agents ID. Must be a valid UUID. |
| score | `number` | No | Agent's score for the workitem, from 0 - 100, higher being better |
